I try to use a combobox and have the following effect:
- I have a datagrid row with a combobox column, the column is filled with an entry ("A" for further reference) from a list of allowed entries
- The Combobox is bound to this list of allowed entries
- When I choose an entry (say "B" ) using the mouse, the initial entry wil not be changed to the newly selected one
- When I enter the same entry ("B") using the keyboard the column is changed

Any idea?
